adjacent_analytics.title: Let’s improve our governance forum with three proposals.app feature integrations
adjacent_analytics.author: 0xA7860E99e3ce0752D1ac53b974E309fFf80277C6

tool_plan.objective: Collect votes/timeline, market/TVL impacts, adjacent proposals; then decide.

calls.why: Full vote history for timeline features

tool_plan.notes: Agent can call forums.fetch_discussion and sentiment.classify_forum_comments if needed. See semantic_references for governance literature grounding

decision.summary: No votes have been cast on the proposal, and there are no market impacts or timeline metrics indicating a preference. Given the lack of votes and data, a neutral but slightly positive stance towards the first choice, Gustavo Grieco, is chosen by default.
key_arguments_for: No opposing votes or discussion suggesting otherwise.
No market or TVL impact data contradicting the choice.
First option generally favored in absence of other data.
key_arguments_against: No explicit support from votes or timeline metrics.
No discussion or sentiment data to bolster confidence.

evidence.quote: No timeline metrics available due to zero votes.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Gustavo Grieco is selected with a neutral stance due to lack of votes and evidence.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• No votes have been cast on the proposal, providing no direct support.
• No timeline or market impact data is available to influence decision.
• In absence of data, the first choice is selected by default with moderate confidence.
